Bazen stres atmak bazende durduk yere stres olmak için birebir bir oyun. Mouse una bileğine güvenenleri buraya alalım lütfen. Herkes oynamak zorunda değil sonuçta Steam büyük bir platform ve bir çok türde oyun barındırıyor. İllaki herkese göre bir oyun vardır bence :)
Nice Game but i got VAC banned sadly :/

Minus the hackers you find once in awhile, which you can in all games, if you really wanna improve your over-all aim and positioning, this competitive FPS is the game for you!

For a game that went Free-To-Play, everyone was scared it was going to turn into a hacking free-for-all, but it hasn't for the most part, getting past the first 15 levels of your account, you should probably play casuals, so you aren't matched with such low trust-factor players, after that.. You're golden.
es para un muy buen juego

This game could be described as the most competitive shooter out there. The matches are Incredibly satisfying to win, but overall this game is COOPERATIVE and TEAM-BASED. Would recommend for those willing to work together and have patience with their teammates during competitive play. If you work with your squad and practice, you'll be big boolin. Toxicity and bm will result in 1-taps and "get gud"'s from people who actually give a shit about the game, in addition to losing.  Stupid nerds.
